content: counts as v_stitch *6 double_crochet shell 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet into next chain 2 space v_stitch in next chain 1 space 6 double_crochet shell in next chain 2 space repeat from * until end of round end by slip stitching into 3rd chain of chain 5 that started round 18 v- stitches 18 - 6 double_crochet shell stitches in diagram row 8 is in green round 9 9 months chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in chain 2 space in previous row counts as 6 double_crochet shell *v_stitch in next chain 1 space 6 double_crochet shell in next chain 2 space repeat from * until end of round end round by slip stitching into 3rd chain of chain 3 12 months chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in chain 2 space in previous row counts as 6 double_crochet shell *v_stitch in next chain 1 space 6 double_crochet shell in next chain 2 space repeat from * until end of round end round by slip stitching into 3rd chain of chain 3 size 2t chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in chain 2 space in previous row counts as 6 double_crochet shell *v_stitch in next chain 1 space 6 double_crochet shell in next chain 2 space repeat from * until end of round end round by slip stitching into 3rd chain of chain 3 repeat rounds 8 & 9 until desired length i ended the skirt by doing 2 rounds in a contrasting color added chain boarder to very last row of the skirt by chain 3 and slip into every other stitch / space all the way around this is optional sleeves maybe left as a tank top or you can choose to add sleeves to add sleeves simply work half_double_crochet in stitches around the arm holes keep adding rounds until you reach desired length ____________________________________________________________________________________________ page 10 of 12 unique crochet & knitting designs by theresa knapp ©2016 please do not reproduce change share or sell images or patterns back of dress button holes attach matching buttons on the left side of the dress on row 1 & 2 and on row 6 & 7 remember row 1 is the collar of the dress on the right side attach yarn to the collar of the dress see photo diagram 9 chain 1 and work 1 single_crochet into same space work 9 more single_crochet down edge of the dress turn row 2 chain 1 counts as turning chain 1 single_crochet in first stitch 1 single_crochet in remaining 9 stitches turn row 3 chain 1 counts as turning chain 1 single_crochet in first stitch 1 single_crochet in next stitch chain 4 skip 2 stitches 1 single_crochet in next 2 stitches chain 4 skip 2 stitches 1 single_crochet in last 2 stitches turn row 4 chain 1 counts as turning chain 1 single_crochet in first stitch 1 single_crochet in next stitch 3 single_crochet into chain 4 space 1 single_crochet in next 2 stitches 3
